faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently asked questions

q1.question: Do I need technical knowledge to work with GRIDIX?
q1.answer: No. The interface is intuitive. To embed widget on website, just copy one line of code.

q2.question: Can I try before buying?
q2.answer: Yes! We provide 7 days free access to PRO plan. No card required, full access to all features. After trial period, your project will pause for 30 days, then be deleted. Project will be unavailable to clients.

q3.question: How quickly can I launch a project?
q3.answer: Project creation takes from 1 hour provided you have prepared floor plan table and all visualization, including: 3D building render, floor plans, apartment layouts (2D and 3D), additional renovation visualization and other sales renders. Quality visualization significantly increases conversion and visual perception.

q4.question: Are there limits on number of objects?
q4.answer: No limits on number of apartments, floors or sections in project. You can create projects of any scale.

q1.question: What image formats are supported?
q1.answer: JPG, JPEG, PNG formats are supported. Recommended resolution: 1920√ó1080 px. Maximum file size: 10 MB.

q2.question: Can I work from phone or tablet?
q2.answer: Yes, admin panel is adapted for mobile devices. You can manage projects from any device.

q3.question: How securely is data stored?
q3.answer: We use Supabase (PostgreSQL) with data encryption, GDPR compliant. Backups are created automatically every day.

q4.question: Is there API for integrations?
q4.answer: Yes, PRO plan includes REST API for integration with your systems. Documentation is available in personal account.

q1.question: Can I pay from legal entity?
q1.answer: Yes, you can choose "Invoice" payment method, and system will generate invoice. After invoice payment confirmation, subscription activates. Important: for correct invoice, configure your details in account. We also provide closing documents (act, invoice).

q2.question: What happens after trial period ends?
q2.answer: After 7 days trial period, you can choose plan and pay subscription. If you don't pay, project will pause for 30 days, then be deleted.

q3.question: Can I change plan during work?
q3.answer: Yes, you can switch from BASIC to PRO or vice versa at any time. Changes take effect from next billing period.

q4.question: Is there refund?
q4.answer: We refund within 7 days after payment if you're not satisfied with service. No questions asked.

q5.question: How many projects can I create?
q5.answer: Unlimited number. Plan is paid separately for each active project.
